content: I am a machine learning engineer at Facebook London. I received my Ph.D. from École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) where I worked on private and robust machine learning. I am mainly a practitioner but also study algorithmic tools from a theoretical perspective.
summary: I am a machine learning engineer at Facebook London. I received my Ph.D. from École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) where I worked on private and robust machine learning. I am mainly a practitioner but also study algorithmic tools from a theoretical perspective.
title: Georgios Damaskinos
